import React from 'react' import { Checkbox } from '@/components/checkBox' import { Radio } from '@/components/radio/index' import { SmallHeading } from '@/components/headings/index' import './index.scss' class TabAndroid extends React.Component { state = { coupons: false, largeIcon: false, image: false, notificationSound: false, android: false, priority: 'high', additionalPairs: [ { key: '', value: '', canAddMore: true, }, ], } _addPairs = () => { const { additionalPairs } = this.state additionalPairs.push({ key: '', value: '', canAddMore: false, }) this.setState({ additionalPairs }) } _removePairs = index => { const { additionalPairs } = this.state additionalPairs.splice(index, 1) this.setState({ additionalPairs }) } render() { const { coupons, largeIcon, image, notificationSound, android, priority } = this.state return (
this.setState({ coupons: !coupons })} > Coupons {coupons && (
)}
this.setState({ largeIcon: !largeIcon })} > Large Icon {largeIcon && (
)}
this.setState({ image: !image })}> Image {image && (
)}
this.setState({ notificationSound: !notificationSound })} > Notification Sound {notificationSound && (
)}
this.setState({ android: !android })} > Android {android && (
)}
Notification Priority * Default Heigh Medium
Actions *
Choose what happens when user clicks the body of this push notification.
Additional Key Value pairs (Optional):
{this.state.additionalPairs.map((part, index) => (
(part.key = e.currentTarget.value)} className="form-input mrgn-10" placeholder="key" /> (part.value = e.currentTarget.value)} placeholder="value" />
+
))}
) } } export default TabAndroid
